imgDesc.text:
The Great Songs of Khvarena are the physical manifestation of Khvarena's might, collected and fused by the first Pari within the flowery sea used to cleanse the land of impurity.
The power of Khvarena creates a barrier in its area. Only a Pari with the <color=#ffe14b>Twin-Horned Chaplet</color> can touch them. <color=#ffe14b>Sorush</color> , with the Chaplet, may <color=#ffe14b>use her power</color> to collect them.
